Cybersecurity Consultant Job at Amplux International Company




        
    

        
        At Amplux International Company is a leading supplier of electrical, mechanical, and electronics products, catering to the diverse needs of industries and individuals. Our extensive range of products and services is designed to provide innovative solutions, exceptional quality, and unparalleled customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cybersecurity Consultant

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Responsibilities
Risk Assessment:
     

            
    




	Conduct thorough assessments to identify vulnerabilities in systems, networks, and applications.
	Analyze potential threats and their impact on the organization.


Security Solutions Design:


	Develop and implement security measures to protect against cyber threats.
	Recommend solutions like firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and encryption tools.


Compliance and Governance:


	Ensure the organization complies with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001).
	Develop policies and procedures to maintain security standards.


Incident Response:


	Assist in responding to security breaches or incidents.
	Develop and test incident response plans to minimize damage.


Security Awareness Training:


	Educate employees on cybersecurity best practices and potential threats.
	Conduct training sessions to raise awareness about phishing, social engineering, and other risks.


Continuous Monitoring:


	Monitor systems for potential security threats.
	Stay updated on the latest cybersecurity trends, threats, and technologies.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Eng Degree or HND with 1-2 years of experience.


Salary
N75,000 - N200,000 / Month.

Method of Application 

Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: impeccableimpact31@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
